welcome.title: Welcome to BodyMetrics
welcome.subtitle: Segmental Body Composition Analysis with total privacy.
welcome.guide_1_text: This app does NOT store raw weight files permanently. Those live on your SD card. You must reload .CSV files each time you open the app. What we DO save in this browser is your **Client List** and the links between measurements and clients.
welcome.guide_2_text:
To prevent the scale from wiping history when switching patients: **1. Remove SD Card.** ‚Üí 2. Press and hold SET to turn on. ‚Üí 3. Select your wildcard user with arrows. ‚Üí 4. Update patient data. ‚Üí 5. Re-insert SD & Weigh. 
(Removing the card prevents the scale from wiping previous history on the file).
welcome.guide_3_text: Every time you open the app, drag all files from the SD card here. The app will automatically recognize which measurements are already assigned to your clients and which are new.
welcome.guide_4_text: The 'Export' button generates a clean, universal .csv file. It works with Excel, Google Sheets, Numbers, or LibreOffice. It's a clean format ready for you to use anywhere.
welcome.guide_5_text: Although medical data is on the SD, your Client List is in this browser. Go to 'Settings' > 'Download Backup' frequently so you don't lose your client roster.
welcome.guide_6_text: This app is open source. If you have technical skills, you can download the code from GitHub and run it completely offline on your local server.
